title: 3rd age kiteshield

properties.name: description
properties.value: The 3rd age kiteshield is a part of the 3rd age melee set. Level 65 Defence is required to wield the kiteshield. The 3rd age kiteshield is a possible reward from hard, elite and master tier Treasure Trails and cannot be made through the Smithing skill.

Item ID10352

The 3rd age kiteshield is a part of the 3rd age melee set. Level 65 Defence is required to wield the kiteshield. The 3rd age kiteshield is a possible reward from hard, elite and master tier Treasure Trails and cannot be made through the Smithing skill.

Although it is one of the more powerful shields available in-game, it is rare to see it used in combat as there are several similarly powerful shields which are cheaper or significantly easier to obtain.


 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-10-4
 Defence bonuses
+63+65+61-3+63
 Other bonusesSlot

The MimicN/A 11/5,244; 1/5,750

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The stat bonuses of the 3rd age kiteshield more closely resemble a square shield rather than a kiteshield; it has equal ranged and stab defence bonuses.

[[File:3rd age kiteshield detail.png|100px|left]]
The '''3rd age kiteshield''' is a part of the [[3rd Age armour|3rd age melee set]]. Level 65 [[Defence]] is required to wield the kiteshield. The 3rd age kiteshield is a possible reward from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]], [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] and [[Clue scroll (master)|master]] tier [[Treasure Trails]] and cannot be made through the [[Smithing]] skill.

Although it is one of the more powerful [[shields]] available in-game, it is rare to see it used in [[combat]] as there are several similarly powerful shields which are cheaper or significantly easier to obtain.
